game.name: Algatraz
game.genres: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: Play as an alligator in ALGATRAZ, a unique prison setting where you decide your path: explore the sprawling grounds, assist guards, uncover hidden secrets, or wreak havoc on detainees and staff. With no rules or mandatory missions, the choice is yours in this dynamic, player-driven experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as an alligator in ALGATRAZ, a unique prison setting where you decide your path: explore the sprawling grounds, assist guards, uncover hidden secrets, or wreak havoc on detainees and staff. With no rules or mandatory missions, the choice is yours in this dynamic, player-driven experience.
